description: moon +‎ struck. Compare German Low German maansüchtig, German mondsüchtig.

adjectives.description: moonstruck (comparative more moonstruck, superlative most moonstruck)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Crazy or insane when affected by the phases of the Moon.
(by extension) Showing irrational behaviour, especially of a romantic or sentimental nature.
examples: [W]e can also overlook the verbiage of a good deal of the mind-cure literature, some of which is so moonstruck with optimism and so vaguely expressed that an academically trained intellect finds it almost impossible to read it at all.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Made sick, or (like fishes) unsuitable for food, by the supposed influence of the Moon.
